response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,000,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
